#####                                 #####
##### IMPUTE MISSING COVARIATE VALUES #####
#####                                 #####

```{r}
##### LOAD PACKAGES
library("sas7bdat")
library("haven")
library("Hmisc")
library("dplyr")
library("table1")
library("tidyverse")

```

```{r}
##### LOAD DATASET
PFAS_B_NA <- read.sas7bdat("C:/Users/jarva/Desktop/James-Todd Lab/PFASandAdiposity/Data/PFAS_B_C.sas7bdat")
PFAS_BD_NA <- read.sas7bdat("C:/Users/jarva/Desktop/James-Todd Lab/PFASandAdiposity/Data/PFAS_BD_C.sas7bdat")

```

```{r}
##### REPLACE MISSING VALUES AND BLANK SPACES WITH "NA"
PFAS_B_NA <- PFAS_B_NA %>% mutate_all(~ifelse(is.nan(.), NA, .))
PFAS_B_NA[PFAS_B_NA == ""] <- NA

##### FOR THE INCOME VARIABLE, REPLACE "IDK" ANSWERS WITH "NA"
PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d <- ifelse(PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d == 9, NA, 
                                       PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d)

##### FOR THE INCOME VARIABLE, DUE TO SMALL NUMBERS OF OBSERVATIONS PER CATEGORY,
##### COMBINED THE TWO LOWEST CATEGORIES
PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d <- ifelse(PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d == 1 | PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d == 2, 3, 
                                       PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d)

##### FOR THE RACE VARIABLE, DUE TO SMALL NUMBERS OF OBSERVATIONS PER CATEGORY,
##### COMBINED THE CATEGORIES "OTHER" AND ">1 RACE"
PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d <- ifelse(PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d == "more than 1 race", 
                                       "other", PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d)

table(PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d)

##### CHECK MISSINGNESS OF CONTINUOUS DEMOGRAPHIC VARIABLES
summary(PFAS_B_NA$age_mom_enroll_d)
PFAS_B_NA$mom_age_comp_d_ma17 <- PFAS_B_NA$mom_age_days_comp_d_ma17/365
summary(PFAS_B_NA$mom_age_comp_d_ma17)
summary(PFAS_B_NA$bmi_mom_prepreg_d)     # 1 NA
summary(PFAS_B_NA$parity_d)              

##### CHECK MISSINGNESS OF CATEGORICAL DEMOGRAPHIC VARIABLES
PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d <- as.factor(PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d)
PFAS_B_NA$coll_grad <- as.factor(PFAS_B_NA$coll_grad)
PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d <- as.factor(PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d)
PFAS_B_NA$gt70k <- as.factor(PFAS_B_NA$gt70k)
PFAS_B_NA$smokpreg_final_d <- as.factor(PFAS_B_NA$smokpreg_final_d)
PFAS_B_NA$married_cohab <- as.factor(PFAS_B_NA$married_cohab)

summary(PFAS_B_NA$race2_mom_epi_epia_d)  # 2 NAs
summary(PFAS_B_NA$coll_grad)             # 2 NAs
summary(PFAS_B_NA$income_hh_epq_epqa_d)  # 45 NAs
summary(PFAS_B_NA$gt70k)                 # 45 NAs
summary(PFAS_B_NA$smokpreg_final_d)      # 1 NAs
summary(PFAS_B_NA$married_cohab)    # 2 NAs

##### TABLE OF MISSINGNESS
table1(~ age_mom_enroll_d + mom_age_comp_d_ma17 + bmi_mom_prepreg_d + parity_d, 
       data = PFAS_B_NA, overall="Total")

table1(~ race2_mom_epi_epia_d + coll_grad + gt70k + smokpreg_final_d + married_cohab,
       data = PFAS_B_NA, overall="Total")

```

```{r}
PFAS_BD_NA <- PFAS_BD_NA %>% mutate_all(~ifelse(is.nan(.), NA, .))

PFAS_BD_NA$coll_grad <- as.factor(PFAS_BD_NA$coll_grad)

       data = PFAS_BD_NA, overall="Total")

```

```{r}
##### IMPUTE MISSING VALUES USING "HMISC".
##### aregImpute() ALLOWS MEAN IMUPTATION USING ADDITIVE REGRESSION BOOTSTRAPPING, AND PREDICTIVE MEAN MATCHING.
##### https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2016/03/tutorial-powerful-packages-imputing-missing-values/
set.seed(1234)

PFAS_B_ARG <- aregImpute(~ income_hh_epq_epqa_d + married_cohab +
                         gt70k + smokpreg_final_d + bmi_mom_prepreg_d + parity_d + 
                         coll_grad + race2_mom_epi_epia_d + g_age_days_COLL_D_BLD1 + 
                         mom_age_comp_d_ma17 + PFNA2 + PFHxS + 
                         Me_PFOSA_AcOH2 + Et_PFOSA_AcOH + PFOA + PFOS, 
                         nk = 0, data = PFAS_B_NA, n.impute = 5)

##### EXTRACT IMPUTED VALUES AND FORM A DATASET
PFAS_B_IMP <- as.data.frame(impute.transcan(PFAS_B_ARG, imputation=5, data=PFAS_B_NA, 
                                          list.out=TRUE, pr=FALSE, check=FALSE))

##### MERGE ORIGNIAL DATASET WITH IMPUTED DATASET
PFAS_B_BIND <- cbind(PFAS_B_NA ,PFAS_B_IMP)

##### DROP VARIABLES WITH MISSING (NON-IMPUTED) DATA
PFAS_B_COMP <- PFAS_B_BIND[ , colSums(is.na(PFAS_B_BIND)) == 0]
PFAS_B_COMP <- PFAS_B_COMP %>% select(-contains(".1"))

```

```{r}
##### IMPUTE MISSING VALUES USING "HMISC".
##### aregImpute() ALLOWS MEAN IMUPTATION USING ADDITIVE REGRESSION BOOTSTRAPPING, AND PREDICTIVE MEAN MATCHING.
##### https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2016/03/tutorial-powerful-packages-imputing-missing-values/
set.seed(1234)

PFAS_BD_ARG <- aregImpute(~ income_hh_epq_epqa_d + married_cohab +
                         gt70k + smokpreg_final_d + bmi_mom_prepreg_d + parity_d + 
                         coll_grad + race2_mom_epi_epia_d + g_age_days_COLL_D_BLD1 + 
                         mom_age_days_mdxa17 + PFNA2 + PFHxS + 
                         Me_PFOSA_AcOH2 + Et_PFOSA_AcOH + PFOA + PFOS, 
                         nk = 0, data = PFAS_BD_NA, n.impute = 5)

##### EXTRACT IMPUTED VALUES AND FORM A DATASET
PFAS_BD_IMP <- as.data.frame(impute.transcan(PFAS_BD_ARG, imputation=5, data=PFAS_BD_NA, 
                                          list.out=TRUE, pr=FALSE, check=FALSE))

##### MERGE ORIGNIAL DATASET WITH IMPUTED DATASET
PFAS_BD_BIND <- cbind(PFAS_BD_NA ,PFAS_BD_IMP)

##### DROP VARIABLES WITH MISSING (NON-IMPUTED) DATA
PFAS_BD_COMP <- PFAS_BD_BIND[ , colSums(is.na(PFAS_BD_BIND)) == 0]
PFAS_BD_COMP <- PFAS_BD_COMP %>% select(-contains(".1"))

```


```{r}
##### RE-CHECK VARIABLE DISTRIBUTION FOR DATASET WITH IMPUTED DATA 
table1(~ age_mom_enroll_d + mom_age_comp_d_ma17 + bmi_mom_prepreg_d + parity_d, 
       data = PFAS_B_COMP, overall="Total")

table1(~ race2_mom_epi_epia_d + coll_grad + gt70k + smokpreg_final_d + married_cohab, 
       data = PFAS_B_COMP, overall="Total")

##### RE-CHECK VARIABLE DISTRIBUTION FOR DATASET WITH IMPUTED DATA 
table1(~ age_mom_enroll_d + mom_age_days_mdxa17 + bmi_mom_prepreg_d + parity_d, 
       data = PFAS_BD_COMP, overall="Total")

table1(~ race2_mom_epi_epia_d + coll_grad + gt70k + smokpreg_final_d + married_cohab, 
       data = PFAS_BD_COMP, overall="Total")

```
